name: Roll20, Turn Tracker, lock in position
description: Always puts the turn tracker in the same position when opened. You can't drag it, but you can resize it.

user.name: xBladeRunner
user.about: I play Savage Worlds on Roll20 and (maybe soon) AstralTableTop. I love to fix things, so if you have a problem with one of my styles or a suggestion, let me know.

additional_info:
If this isn't the position you want, you can make a copy of this code and modify it. If there's demand, I might try to make a "user style", where you can input the values.

The `ui-id-9` tag isn't guaranteed to be stable, so this might break in the future.
